games

Class Simon

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.Game
      • games.Simon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Simon
extends Game
implements java.util.Observer
    This class will implement the well know Simon game.
    Author:
    Helion

    • Method Detail

      • addToSequence

        private void addToSequence()
        Selects a random number (1 to 4) and increments it to the already available sequence

      • begin

        private void begin()
        Increments the total games played and starts a new round

      • delay

        private static void delay(int duration)
        Delays for a given duration
        Parameters:
        duration - Time in MS to delay for

      • forceQuit

        public static void forceQuit()
        Forcefully quits the game

      • getInput

        private void getInput()
        Gets the user's input for the entire sequence.
        The user must reproduce the same pattern earlier played back in order to advance.

      • getPad

        private boolean getPad(int i)
        Gets the user's input for the i'th pad. Checks if the input is correct or not
        Parameters:
        i - Pad in the sequence to check
        Returns:
        True if the user selected the proper pad, False if the user lost

      • getTop10

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getTop10()
        Returns the top 10 saved rounds from the database as an ArrayList of an array of Strings
        Every ArrayList entry contains the following:
        [Game ID][Score][Player Name][Player 2 Name][Date Played]
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String arrays containing SCORE, PLAYERNAME and DATE

      • incrementScore

        private void incrementScore()
        Increments the player's score and updates the GUI

      • playPad

        private void playPad(int i)
        Illuminates the quadrant of the Launchpad represented by the given parameter and plays the related sound.
        If the given parameter is equal to 5, the "wrong input" sound is played and the Launchpad illuminates entirely in red
        Parameters:
        i - Selected quadrant

      • playSequence

        private void playSequence()
        Plays back the current sequence of the game

        Quits the game and closes GUI
